description: The Castlewellan Leyland Cypress (Cupressocyparis x leylandii 'Castlewellan') is an amazing evergreen tree with a unique look and an attractive shape. It grows quickly once established, reaching a height of 8-15 ft. It has a pyramidal shape and glossy, dark-green foliage that turns into a bright golden color during the winter months. In addition, the dense foliage provides excellent wind protection and noise reduction. It also tolerates a wide range of soils, making it great for hedges and privacy screens. Furthermore, the Castlewellan Leyland Cypress exhibits superb disease and pest tolerance. With its all-year-round evergreen color and elegant form, it is an excellent choice for any garden.
